title: recipes_P.J.'s_Fresh_Corn_Salad
text:
Title: P.J.'s Fresh Corn Salad.
.
Description: My son in-law makes this salad during the summer. It is so refreshing on a hot day..
.
Ingredients:.
- 8 ears fresh corn.
- 1 tomato, chopped.
- 1 zucchini, chopped.
- 1 cucumber, peeled and chopped.
- 1 red onion, chopped.
- 1 red bell pepper, chopped.
- 0.5 cup Italian-style salad dressing.
.
Instructions:.
- Husk the corn and slice the kernels from the cob. In a large bowl, mix together the corn, tomato, zucchini, cucumber, onion and red bell pepper. Pour dressing over vegetables and toss to coat. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 141 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 23 g.
fiberContent: 4 g.
proteinContent: 4 g.
saturatedFatContent: 1 g.
sodiumContent: 262 mg.
sugarContent: 6 g.
fatContent: 5 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 8 servings.
